actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to reduce the age of entitlement to medicare benefits from 65 to 62 for men and to 60 for women.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Reduces the age of entitlement to social security benefits from 65 to 62 for men and to 60 for women under titles II (Old-Age, Survivors', And Disability Insurance) and XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to reduce the age of entitlement to medicare benefits from 65 to 62 for men and to 60 for women.
